name: ELEX WooCommerce Dynamic Pricing and Discounts
author: ELEXtensions

sections.description:
Rule Based Dynamic Pricing And Discount Plugin Which Dynamically Sets Discount for Customer Based On Parameters Like Quantity,Weight,Price

Introduction

When you run an online store, a classic marketing strategy is to offer discounts to customers. It is important that you strategically create rules for the discount offers without affecting the profitability of your store. Setting a maximum discount amount for every applied rule is a simple solution to this predicament.
In addition, things get complicated when you have multiple categories of products listed on your store, and want to offer discounts based on multiple parameters.
Dynamic Pricing and Discounts for WooCommerce plugin offers well-defined solutions to help you set the best discount offers on your store.

Features

  • Product rules to set discounts on specific products.
  • Category rules to set discounts on all products in a category.
  • Option to set rules based on : Weight, Quantity, Price, Total Units and Number of items.
  • Pricing table feature will appear on product page to show all offer applicable on that product, if a product has multiple product rules.
  • Pricing table visibility (Hide/Show) in settings.
  • Option to Set maximum discount to be allowed on every rule.
  • Option to set rules expiry date (From Date , To Date).
  • Option to set rules based on user roles.
  • Multiple discount type available i.e (Flat Discount, Percentage Discount , Set a fix price for each unit).

Premium version Features

For complete list of features and details, please visit ELEX Dynamic Pricing and Discounts for WooCommerce

      Product Rules:

    • Option to configure maximum discount amount.
    • Option to enable repeated execution.
    • Restrict discounts based on customer email ids, the maximum number of orders or customer’s total spending.
      Category Rules:

    • Option to configure the maximum discount amount.
    • Enable discounts for a specific time frame. Configure the start and end date for the discounted offer.
    • Restrict discounts based on customer email ids, the maximum number of orders or customer’s total spending.
      Cart Rules:

    • If your cart contains two to three products, get 20% discount on cart (max discount allowed = $50)
    • If you have added at least 2 items in the cart, get a flat discount of $10 on total cart value
    • If the weight of total items in the cart is more than 15 pounds, get 30% discount on cart
    • 5% discount on all items in the cart for our wholesalers (specific role); valid from dd/mm/yyyy to dd/mm/yyyy
      Multi Product Rules:

    • Buy two units of one product (P1) and three units of another product (P2), and get 20% discount (maximum discount allowed = $20.)
    • Buy one unit of (P3) and one unit of product (P4) and get flat $15 discount
    • Buy two units of P5 and two units of P6 at a special price of $29; valid only for Gold Members (specific roles)
    • Buy three units of P7 and one unit of P3 at a special price of $10.99; offer valid from dd/mm/yyyy to dd/mm/yyyy
      Multi Category Rules:

    • Buy 2 units in x category and 2 units in y category and get 20% off on both
    • Buy 1 item in x category and 3 items in y category and get flat $50 discount
      BOGO Rules:

    • Buy two and get one free
    • Buy two distinct products and get another product free
      BOGO Category Rules:

    • Buy 2 units in X category and 1 unit in Y category and get 1 cap free
    • Buy 3 items in X category and 1 item in Y category and get 1 shirts free and 1 belt free
      Tag Rules:

    • Buy a minimum three units of a product tag (T1) and get 15% discount (maximum discount allowed = $10)
    • Buy between five to 10 units of a product tag (T2), and get a flat discount of $10
    • Buy at least 3 pounds of a product tag (T3) and get a special reduced price of $20
    • Buy a product with product tag (T4) at a price range between $10 and $20, and get a 30% discount
    • Get a product tag (T5) at 30% discount only for our Gold Members (specific role)
    • Get 20% discount on a product tag (T6) valid from dd/mm/yyyy to dd/mm/yyyy
      BOGO Tag Rules:

    • Buy one product with the tag and get a product free
    • Buy one product with the tag and get more than one product free
    • Buy more than one product with the tag and get a product free
    • Buy more than one product with the tag and get more than one product free
      Features:

    • Display Price Table on Product Page with a number of options to position it.
    • Apply Combinational Rules based on Combinations of Different Products (eg: Two red mugs and one green mug)
    • Apply Category Rules on Desired Categories
    • Apply Cart Rules on All items in the Cart
    • Option to Apply ‘Buy and Get Free’ Offers on Specific Products or a Group of Products
    • Apply Tag Rules on Products
    • Option to Apply BOGO Offers on Specific Products with a Product Tag
    • Compatible with WPML, along with Out-of-the-box Support for French and German (Deutschland) Languages
    • Set Maximum Possible Discount Amount on Every Rule (to ensure high discounts won’t affect your profits)
    • Timely Updates and Bug Fixes
    • Premium Support

Premium Version walkthrough Video

Documentation

Visit the Product Documentation for ELEX Dynamic Pricing and Discounts Plugin for WooCommerce.

About ELEXtensions

We are a group of WordPress and WooCommerce enthusiasts with a vision to solve genuine problems related to WordPress & WooCommerce stores.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. That’s it – you can now configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
1.What if I face issues with the plugin? Do you provide support for free products?
If you are facing any issues, please create a topic at plugin support section on wordpress org. Our team will respond back soon.

sections.reviews:
Love the service

By andrewsmith96 on January 31, 2024

The plugin is working better than expected and the support team is very responsive

Works great!

By AudunBK on November 6, 2023

It was relatively easy to set up this plugin and it works great. When I had a problem and contacted the support, they replied me quickly and showed me how to set it up correctly.

Awesome Support and Product

By RosemanArts on October 18, 2023

This was the only plugin I've found that works well for our needs. We had an issue with the plugin and support met with me several times and worked to solve it quickly. Very highly recommended.

Efficient Support

By martobarbara on October 13, 2023

I had a problem with the settings of a rule that caused a bug in other plugins. I asked for support and immediatly a call was booked and the problem was identified and solved in 10 min.

Be Careful

By uomiguel (unimento) on October 27, 2021

If you activate the plugin and apply a discount to shop, the plugin change the original price of the product, when you disable it the discount price still there so you have to change manually all the prices again. There is no option to reset the prices again so if you have 2000 products is a hard work

Best free plugin that provides category discount

By TechMan on April 23, 2021

After trying like hundreds of plugins, I stumbled upon this one. This is the best plugin that provides category discount in free version. Interface is very easy to use and there are no complex settings to configure. No bullshit or anything just straight up categories discount in free version. Works like a charm!

Great plugin for discounts

By msdesignfoto on March 24, 2021

After I try a dozen discount plugins, I found that Elex was the best option for my client's online store. But we had an issue where the discounts were being applied when they should not. They support did not rest until they have fixed the issue. The UI is easy to use and setup the discounts. The free version is great for general purposes and simple discount rules, and even some mid-complex ones.

Simple yet powerful

By Leandro (leandroprz) on March 3, 2021

The free version is a bit limited, but it is perfect for my needs. I usually run sales for whole categories and this works perfect for that. Thank you.

Great BUT

By gigasloop on December 16, 2020

This plugin does exactly what I need it to do but there is no way to override the display of the pricing table without overriding it in the plugin file itself so every time I install an update to the plugin I have to edit the plugin template to put some very simple changes in place. It would be great if The plugin would allow template changes to be made in the child theme.

not useful

By peterk855 on September 30, 2020

I found that plugin on the WPML compatible plugin site that was the reason to give it a try. But at least in Version 1.1.0 (or maybe the free version) it's completely unusable, sorry to say that. Pricing list does not show up, discount is calculated in cart but not shown, just massive lack of functionality compared to other plugins. wpml compatibility alone is really not enough (seems more like marketing strategy)
